title: John Cena Becomes 17-Time World Champion
summary: John Cena did the unthinkable and became a 17-time world champion, breaking Ric Flair's record.
content: John Cena has rewritten history books by winning his 17th world championship, officially breaking Ric Flairâ€™s long-standing record. The WWE Universe erupted after Cena hit a final Attitude Adjustment for the win.

title: Is WrestleMania 41 the Worst Ever?
summary: Fans are calling Night 2 of WrestleMania 41 the worst in history due to poor match outcomes.
content: WrestleMania 41 Night 2 ended in disappointment for many fans as controversial finishes and lackluster matches led to a night many want to forget. Social media exploded with #WorstManiaEver trending worldwide.
